      • getSegmentStrLen

        public int getSegmentStrLen(int i,
                            int partition)
                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Returns the maximum valid character length of a field that shows this segments value. Takes into account the encoding of the segment, so may mean numbers or alphanumeric.
        Parameters:
        i - segment bit index (0-2)

        Returns:
        Length of max valid character
